summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6252 for the improvement of West Emerson Street, southwesterly roadway, from 11th Ave. West to 12th Ave. West; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90359, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
